name: Interface AbstractDocument.Content
text:
Interface to describe a sequence of character content that
 can be edited.  Implementations may or may not support a
 history mechanism which will be reflected by whether or not
 mutations return an UndoableEdit implementation.

methods.description:
Creates a position within the content that will
 track change as the content is mutated.
Current length of the sequence of character content.

methods.method_sig:
UndoableEdit insertString (int where,
                          String str)
                   throws BadLocationException
methods.description: Inserts a string of characters into the sequence.

methods.method_sig:
UndoableEdit remove (int where,
                    int nitems)
             throws BadLocationException
methods.description: Removes some portion of the sequence.

methods.method_sig:
String getString (int where,
                 int len)
          throws BadLocationException
methods.description: Fetches a string of characters contained in the sequence.

methods.method_sig:
void getChars (int where,
              int len,
              Segment txt)
       throws BadLocationException
methods.description: Gets a sequence of characters and copies them into a Segment.
